valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 13 Jan 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 14 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low just west of FitzRoy 993 expected northeast FitzRoy 1002 by 1800 Tuesday. New low expected north Forties 991 by same time

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, southerly 5 to 7 becoming cyclonic 3 to 5, then northwesterly 5 to 7 later. In east, southeasterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 at first, becoming cyclonic later.
Sea state
In west, rough or very rough becoming moderate or rough. in east, high at first in north, otherwise rough or very rough.
Weather
In west, rain or showers. In east, rain or sleet.
Visibility
Moderate or good, occasionally poor.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
15:50 (UTC) on Mon 12 Jan 2026
Southeasterly storm force 10 decreasing severe gale force 9 soon
